title: OCD: Not Crazy, Just Insane: My Life as a Mom and Wife With Obsessive Compulsive Disorder - A Short Story
description: My world changed after a traumatic c-section and subsequent infection nearly took my life. Irrational thoughts and fears replaced the calm, fun-loving, logical person I used to be, and I have been living with OCD for seventeen years.This isn't just another self-help book but if it does help you in some way, even to help you feel less alone in the scary and constantly demanding world of OCD, then I have accomplished my goal.This is my story about living with OCD and Multiple Chemical Sensitivity while balancing the demands of raising a family and taking care of a home.
author: Tammy Bacon
